Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey and red in section, the interior bears faint traces of three lines of black-painted demotic text, the exterior is covered with light-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393879) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393879)
